text: Peristernia philberti is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. Peristernia philberti is a synonym of Peristernia philberti according to ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1844
title: Peristernia philberti
